name: Your Best Nightmare
description:
This is a personal fan game of mine that I had been working on for a working / interactive screen cosplay! I'm a huge fan of Undertale and this boss battle in particular, since it was such a departure from the rest of the game. So, obviously that meant that I had to remake it from scratch.

How To Play

Move: Arrow Keys
Action: Z or Enter
Dodge as much as you can, call out for help, and fight to take down Flowey!

Visual Epilepsy Warning

Warning! This game contains flashing lights, static, and other such patterns, which could be potentially harmful to those who experience visual epilepsy! Play at your own risk, and take care!

Spoilers

This fan game has massive spoilers for the neutral ending of Undertale! So, if you haven't already, do yourself a favor and go play Undertale! It holds a very special place in my heart, and perhaps it will in yours, too.
